Grammar practice 2: Simple present passi.question: Which sentences use the simple present passive?
Grammar practice 2: Simple present passi.correct_answer: The sculptures are exhibited in the city park.*The sculptures are described on labels around the park.*Many of the sculptures are photographed every day.
